ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, I ve been reading this maillist for about a month now. . . . and find it all very fascinating, I am due to start my tinkering days soon. . . . but
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,

I've been reading this maillist for about a month now. . . . and find it all
very fascinating, I am due to start my tinkering days soon. . . . but would
really hope that by then. . . .the 3rd book is found. . .

Would also like to add . . . that I have personally found alot of the
information here. . . very useful and the speculation interesting. . .all in
the spirit of roleplay.

However. . .to the previous poster. . .I don't think comments like that are
really required. . . if you do not like what is said . . then ignore it or
unsubscribe. . . others may be interested!

Wibbler - Season 15 Gnome Necromancer - Povar
